title: Remove specific WhatsApp image from galleries and assets

requirements.summary: Remove the specified WhatsApp image from all galleries/pages and eliminate any remaining frontend references to it.
acceptanceCriteria: The image "WhatsApp Image 2026-02-16 at 8.58.51 PM (1)-3" no longer appears on any page, including the Major Projects page ongoing projects gallery.
The Major Projects page (route "/projects") loads without any broken images in the ongoing projects gallery grid.

No remaining code references exist to either "/assets/WhatsApp Image 2026-02-16 at 8.58.51 PM (1)-3.jpeg" or the uploaded filename "WhatsApp Image 2026-02-16 at 8.58.51 PM (1)-3.jpg" (account for either extension if present in assets).

file_operations.description: Remove the ongoing-projects gallery item referencing "/assets/WhatsApp Image 2026-02-16 at 8.58.51 PM (1)-3.jpeg" so it is no longer displayed, and ensure no lingering references to the .jpeg/.jpg variants remain in this page.

requirements.summary: Delete the static uploaded image asset file(s) so they are not shipped with the site build.
acceptanceCriteria: The uploaded image file ("WhatsApp Image 2026-02-16 at 8.58.51 PM (1)-3.jpg") is removed from frontend public assets (or any assets folder where it was placed) if present.
The production build succeeds and the site has no missing-asset 404s related to the removed image.

file_operations.description: Remove the uploaded static asset file so it is no longer included in the frontend build output.
Remove the .jpeg variant of the uploaded static asset file (if present) so it is no longer included in the frontend build output.
